properties.entry: SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , MEM_EMAIL , MEM_GENDER , ENROLL_DATE , BLACK_YN , ENT_YN , WARNING , ADMIN_YN , UPDATE_DATE , ENT_DATE , PROF_IMG FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_PWD = ? AND BLACK_YN = 'N' AND ENT_YN = 'N'
UPADATE MEMBER SET MEM_PWD = ? , MEM_NAME = ? , MEM_EMAIL = ? , MEM_GENDER = ? , UPDATE_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE MEM_ID = ?

SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , MEM_EMAIL , MEM_GENDER , ENROLL_DATE , BLACK_YN , ENT_YN , WARNING , ADMIN_YN , UPDATE_DATE , ENT_DATE , PROF_IMG FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND BLACK_YN = 'N' AND ENT_YN = 'N'
SELECT MEM_PWD FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND BLACK_YN = 'N' AND ENT_YN = 'N'
INSERT INTO BOOKMARK( MEM_NO , DAILY_NO , ENR_DATE) VALUES( ? , ? , SYSDATE)
DELETE FROM BOOKMARK WHERE MEM_NO = ? AND DAILY_NO = ?

SELECT DAILY_NO , MEM_NO , DAILY_CONTENT , ENR_DATE , DAILY_IMG , MEM_NAME , PROF_IMG FROM DAILY JOIN MEMBER USING (MEM_NO) WHERE DAILY_NO IN ( SELECT DAILY_NO FROM BOOKMARK WHERE MEM_NO = ? ORDER BY ENR_DATE DESC ) ORDER BY ENR_DATE DESC
